    vs_3_0
    def c4, 1, 0.5, 6.28318548, -3.14159274
    def c11, 0.00390625, 1, 0, 0
    dcl_position v0
    dcl_color v1
    dcl_texcoord v2
    dcl_color1 v3
    dcl_texcoord4 v4
    dcl_texcoord5 v5
    dcl_texcoord6 v6
    dcl_binormal v7
    dcl_color o0
    dcl_color1 o1.xy
    dcl_texcoord o2
    dcl_texcoord4 o3
    dcl_position o4

def c220, 0, 1, 0.0625, 0.5
dcl_2d s3

    mov r0.x, v4.w
    mov r0.y, v5.w
    mov r0.z, v6.w
    add r0.xyz, r0, c9
    dp3 r0.x, r0, r0
    rsq r0.x, r0.x
    rcp r0.x, r0.x
    add r0.x, r0.x, -c10.x
    mul_sat r0.x, r0.x, c10.y
    add o0.w, -r0.x, c4.x
    mul r0.x, c11.x, v3.z
    frc r0.y, r0.x
    add r0.z, r0.x, -r0.y
    slt r0.y, -r0.y, r0.y
    slt r0.x, r0.x, -r0.x
    mad o1.y, r0.x, r0.y, r0.z
    mov o0.xyz, v1
    mov o1.x, v7.w
    mul o2, c11.yyzz, v2.xyxx
    mov r0, v0
    dp4 r1.x, v4, r0
    dp4 r1.y, v5, r0
    dp4 r1.z, v6, r0
    mov r1.w, v0.w
    add r0, r1, c9
    add r1.x, r0.z, -c5.z
    mov r1.w, c6.w
    mad r1.x, r1.w, r1.x, c7.x
    add r1.x, r1.x, c4.y
    frc r1.x, r1.x
    mad r1.x, r1.x, c4.z, c4.w
    sincos r2.y, r1.x
    mul r1.xyz, c6, v1
    mad r0.xyz, r2.y, r1, r0
    mul r1, r0.y, c1
    mad r1, c0, r0.x, r1
    mad r1, c2, r0.z, r1
    mad r0, c3, r0.w, r1
    mul r1.x, r0.w, c8.z
    mad r0.xy, r1.x, c8, r0

// Automatic vertex shader halo fix inserted with DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i --auto-fix-vertex-halo --only-autofixed --stereo-sampler-vs=s3 1FCDC9ED.txt

add r31.w, r0.w, -r31.y
mad r0.x, r31.w, r31.x, r0.x

    mov o3, r0

//     mov o4, r0 // Relocated to line 84 with shadertool.py
